assetProfile.address2: 6614, Al-Raidah Digital City Al-Nakhil District PO Box 67651
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Elm Company provides ready-made and customized digital solutions in Saudi Arabia. The company offers consulting and IT services, government outsourcing services, and training solutions. It also provides technical solutions; e-products for security, transportation, health, and management; and digital outsourcing solutions. The company was formerly known as Al-ELM Information Security Company and changed its name to Elm Company in 2002. Elm Company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
